00072 Result::Result(const Result& src)
00073 {
00074         this->refcounter = new UINT();
00075         *this->refcounter = 1;
00076 
00077         if(src.details)
00078         {
00079                 this->details = new Details();
00080                 src.details->msg.Copy(&this->details->msg);
00081                 src.details->file.Copy(&this->details->file);
00082                 src.details->func.Copy(&this->details->func);
00083                 this->details->line = src.details->line;
00084         }
00085         else
00086                 this->details = NULL;
00087 }

00089 bool Result::operator==(const Result& r)
00090 {
00091         if(!this->details)
00092                 return !r.details;
00093         else
00094                 return this->details->msg == r.details->msg;
00095 }

00097 Result& Result::operator=(const Result& src)
00098 {
00099         if(&src == this)
00100                 return *this;
00101 
00102         REMOVE(this->details);
00103 
00104         this->details = src.details;
00105         this->refcounter = src.refcounter;
00106         (*this->refcounter)++;
00107 
00108         return *this;
00109 }

00111 Result::~Result()
00112 {
00113         if(--(*refcounter) == 0)
00114                 REMOVE(this->details)
00115 }

00117 String Result::GetLastResult() //EDIT: Replace with operator
00118 {
00119         LPSTR msg;
00120 
00121         if(!details)
00122                 msg = "Result: Success";
00123         else if(details->msg.IsEmpty())
00124                 msg = "Undefined error";
00125         else
00126                 msg = details->msg;
00127

00131                            String(":\n\n") << details->func <<
00132                            String("() returned\n") << msg;
